title: Tales of the Lewd, Nude, Rude, and Crude: Volume One
description: Armando and Belinda are a young married couple. They have their differences and Armando has his job at the construction factory. One night they sit in bed reveling in their amazing relationship and-- Look man, this is a bodice ripper. What do you want me to tell you here?
author: Desiree Goodtimes
